compressed_facts.fact_text: Positions exceeding these limits must be reduced within 5 business days or face automatic liquidation
compressed_facts.original_text: Portfolio exposure to any single asset class cannot exceed 30% of total portfolio value. The maximum leverage ratio allowed is 3:1. Positions exceeding these limits must be reduced within 5 business days or face automatic liquidation.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Accounts maintaining a minimum balance of $1,000 or more are exempt from maintenance fees
compressed_facts.original_text: Accounts with balances below $100 are subject to monthly maintenance fees of $5. Accounts maintaining a minimum balance of $1,000 or more are exempt from maintenance fees. Premium account status requires a minimum balance of $25,000.

compressed_facts.fact_text: The maximum leverage ratio allowed is 3:1
compressed_facts.original_text: Portfolio exposure to any single asset class cannot exceed 30% of total portfolio value. The maximum leverage ratio allowed is 3:1. Positions exceeding these limits must be reduced within 5 business days or face automatic liquidation.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Derivative positions with a notional value exceeding $1,000,000 require risk committee approval
compressed_facts.original_text: Derivative positions with a notional value exceeding $1,000,000 require risk committee approval. The risk committee meets weekly and decisions are communicated within 2 business days.

compressed_facts.fact_text: For questions or clarifications regarding this policy, contact the Compliance Department at compliance@enterprisebank.com or call 1-800-555-0100
compressed_facts.original_text: For questions or clarifications regarding this policy, contact the Compliance Department at compliance@enterprisebank.com or call 1-800-555-0100.

compressed_facts.fact_text: The risk assessment must be completed within 4 hours of transaction initiation
compressed_facts.original_text: Transactions above $50,000 are automatically flagged as critical risk and trigger comprehensive risk assessment procedures. The risk assessment must be completed within 4 hours of transaction initiation.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Any exception extending beyond 90 days requires formal policy amendment procedures
compressed_facts.original_text: Exceptions to compliance requirements cannot exceed 90 days without board approval. Any exception extending beyond 90 days requires formal policy amendment procedures.

compressed_facts.fact_text: However, data cannot be retained beyond 10 years without explicit customer consent
compressed_facts.original_text: Customer transaction data must be retained for a minimum of 7 years as per regulatory requirements. However, data cannot be retained beyond 10 years without explicit customer consent. Personal identifiable information (PII) must be encrypted using AES-256 encryption standards.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Custom limits must be approved by the Executive Risk Committee and reviewed quarterly
compressed_facts.original_text: Corporate accounts with annual transaction volumes exceeding $5,000,000 may apply for custom limit structures. Custom limits must be approved by the Executive Risk Committee and reviewed quarterly.

compressed_facts.fact_text: These exceptions require annual review and re-approval
compressed_facts.original_text: Corporate accounts with verified business relationships exceeding 5 years may be granted increased withdrawal limits. The maximum exception limit is $200,000 per day. These exceptions require annual review and re-approval.

compressed_facts.fact_text: All financial transactions are classified according to risk levels
compressed_facts.original_text: All financial transactions are classified according to risk levels. Low-risk transactions are those below $1,000. Medium-risk transactions range from $1,000 to $10,000. High-risk transactions exceed $10,000 and require enhanced due diligence.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Premium account status requires a minimum balance of $25,000
compressed_facts.original_text: Accounts with balances below $100 are subject to monthly maintenance fees of $5. Accounts maintaining a minimum balance of $1,000 or more are exempt from maintenance fees. Premium account status requires a minimum balance of $25,000.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Credit utilization above 80% of the approved limit triggers automatic review
compressed_facts.original_text: Credit utilization above 80% of the approved limit triggers automatic review. Accounts maintaining utilization above 90% for more than 60 days may have credit limits reduced.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Accounts maintaining utilization above 90% for more than 60 days may have credit limits reduced
compressed_facts.original_text: Credit utilization above 80% of the approved limit triggers automatic review. Accounts maintaining utilization above 90% for more than 60 days may have credit limits reduced.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Standard transaction fees apply as follows: domestic transfers below $1,000 incur a $5 fee
compressed_facts.original_text: Standard transaction fees apply as follows: domestic transfers below $1,000 incur a $5 fee. Transfers between $1,000 and $5,000 incur a $10 fee. Transfers exceeding $5,000 incur a fee of 0.2% of the transaction amount, with a maximum fee cap of $100.

compressed_facts.fact_text: International transfers are subject to additional fees: $25 for transfers below $5,000, $50 for transfers between $5,000 and $25,000, and $100 plus 0.3% for transfers exceeding $25,000
compressed_facts.original_text: International transfers are subject to additional fees: $25 for transfers below $5,000, $50 for transfers between $5,000 and $25,000, and $100 plus 0.3% for transfers exceeding $25,000.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Personal credit lines are limited to 30% of annual income, with a maximum cap of $50,000
compressed_facts.original_text: Personal credit lines are limited to 30% of annual income, with a maximum cap of $50,000. Business credit lines cannot exceed 20% of annual revenue, with a maximum cap of $500,000. Credit limit increases above 50% of the original limit require credit committee approval.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Critical complaints affecting account access must be resolved within 24 hours
compressed_facts.original_text: Customer complaint resolution must be completed within 5 business days for standard issues. Critical complaints affecting account access must be resolved within 24 hours.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Interest-bearing accounts require a minimum balance of $500 to earn interest
compressed_facts.original_text: Interest-bearing accounts require a minimum balance of $500 to earn interest. The interest rate is tiered: 0.5% for balances $500-$10,000, 1.0% for balances $10,000-$50,000, and 1.5% for balances exceeding $50,000.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Customer complaint resolution must be completed within 5 business days for standard issues
compressed_facts.original_text: Customer complaint resolution must be completed within 5 business days for standard issues. Critical complaints affecting account access must be resolved within 24 hours.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Any withdrawal request exceeding these limits must be submitted at least 48 hours in advance and requires approval from the Account Management Department
compressed_facts.original_text: Any withdrawal request exceeding these limits must be submitted at least 48 hours in advance and requires approval from the Account Management Department. Withdrawals above $100,000 require additional verification and may take up to 5 business days to process.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Transactions above $50,000 are automatically flagged as critical risk and trigger comprehensive risk assessment procedures
compressed_facts.original_text: Transactions above $50,000 are automatically flagged as critical risk and trigger comprehensive risk assessment procedures. The risk assessment must be completed within 4 hours of transaction initiation.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Existing accounts with annual transaction volumes exceeding $100,000 must undergo annual KYC review
compressed_facts.original_text: Existing accounts with annual transaction volumes exceeding $100,000 must undergo annual KYC review. The review process must be completed within 30 days of the anniversary date.

compressed_facts.original_text: Customer transaction data must be retained for a minimum of 7 years as per regulatory requirements. compressed_facts.original_text: Derivative positions with a notional value exceeding $1,000,000 require risk committee approval. The risk committee meets weekly and decisions are communicated within 2 business days.

compressed_facts.original_text: All operations must comply with the Bank Secrecy Act (BSA) requirements. Failure to comply with BSA reporting requirements may result in penalties up to $500,000 per violation.

compressed_facts.original_text: All standard account holders are subject to daily withdrawal limits. The maximum daily withdrawal limit for personal accounts is $5,000. compressed_facts.fact_text: All wire transfers above $100,000 are subject to mandatory anti-money laundering (AML) screening and may be held for up to 72 hours for review

compressed_facts.original_text: All financial transactions are classified according to risk levels. Low-risk transactions are those below $1,000. Medium-risk transactions range from $1,000 to $10,000. High-risk transactions exceed $10,000 and require enhanced due diligence.

compressed_facts.fact_text: Core banking systems must maintain 99.9% uptime availability
compressed_facts.original_text: Core banking systems must maintain 99.9% uptime availability. Any system outage exceeding 4 hours triggers business continuity protocols. Critical system failures must be resolved within 8 hours or escalate to executive management.

compressed_facts.original_text: New account openings require complete KYC documentation. Accounts with initial deposits exceeding $25,000 require enhanced due diligence (EDD) procedures. EDD must be completed within 10 business days of account opening.
